nodes.text: 5389 was the designation of a stormtrooper who served with a remnant of the Galactic Empire led by Moff Gideon, stationed at a base on the volcanic planet Nevarro. Around 9 ABY, some infiltrators sabotaged the base's cooling system, which stopped the control of Nevarro's lava around the compound. 5389 and another stormtrooper, 5387, were called upon by one of their stormtrooper comrades to go with trooper. 5389 and 5387 followed suit, not realizing that the infiltrators had been watching from afar.
5389 appeared in "Chapter 12: The Siege" of Jon Favreau's 2019 Disney+ television series The Mandalorian, directed by Carl Weathers and released on November 20, 2020.
